Key Match Events: Cole Palmer scores a penalty to put England ahead
Trent Alexander-Arnold scores a goal to double England's lead
Harry Kane scores a goal to secure England's 3-0 victory
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate picked a team of Euro 2024 hopefuls
Cole Palmer, Eberechi Eze, and Trent Alexander-Arnold were among the players looking to impress and secure a spot on the plane to Germany
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate praised his team’s resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
Harry Kane described the win as a crucial step toward securing a top-four finish
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heavy rain delayed the match by 30 minutes
Others: England beat Bosnia and Herzegovina 3-0 in their latest Euro 2024 warm-up friendly

Cole Palmer's spot-kick was followed by an excellent Alexander-Arnold effort and late Harry Kane goal on a night that provided manager Gareth Southgate with plenty of food for thought ahead of Friday’s final squad submission
